$schema: Pattern Library for Scout Phase Learnings
description: Research insights and risk detection patterns for Scout phase

patterns.title: Detect CORS Risk for Browser Apps with ES6 Modules

risk_detection.check: If task mentions browser/web AND uses ES6 modules
risk_detection.flag: ⚠️ CORS RISK: ES6 modules cannot load from file:// protocol
risk_detection.recommendation: Include dev server (http-server) in architecture to prevent CORS issues

questions_to_ask: How will users run this locally?
Are there any browser security restrictions to consider?
flags_to_raise: CORS risk if ES6 modules + browser

inclusion_in_scout_report.format: ⚠️ CORS RISK: This project uses ES6 modules in a browser context. Recommend including http-server for local development to avoid file:// protocol restrictions.
